price: Efirisε wͻdi deε εhyε Onyankopͻn abufuo no akyi, na wͻtan deε Onyankopͻn pε. Enti Wama wͻn nnwuma ayε kwa.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu ittabaʿū mā askhaṭa al-laha wakarihū riḍ'wānahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
